title: Person of interest named in Mid-City shooting that left 3 dead
content:
NEW ORLEANS -- Police want to talk to a man about shooting in Mid-City that left three people dead and two others injured.
Authorities said 34-year-old Cedric Shawn Jones is not a suspect, but they believe he may have information about the shooting.
The incident happened Oct. 4 around 9:30 p.m. in the 3700 block of Ulloa Street. The coroner said Darome Hilton, 34, Glenquel Emerson, 20, and Bobbie Basquine, 22, all died from gunshot wounds.
During the investigation, authorities discovered two other shooting victims who were taken to the hospital by private conveyance.
Anyone with information about Jones or the shooting is asked to call Crimestoppers at (504) 822-1111.
